DOC.brief_summary: This study randomly assign patient diabetic foot ulcer receive standard therapy ( surgical debridement , saline-moistened gauze offload ) alone standard therapy plus Dermagraft ( R ) . Dermagraft device contain live human fibroblast grow absorbable Vicryl mesh . Patients see weekly heal 12-week treatment period complete .
